description: This file is an HTML document implementing a web-based database viewer with embedded CSS styling and JavaScript functionality. It allows users to browse and view data from connected databases, including features like refreshing database list, expanding content, and dynamic data loading.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets UI states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data table with provided data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a table cell based on the data type and content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full view.
